source_time_signal.description: A breakdown of the time series or signal-based data source types in the dataset. Each label indicates whether it applies to the dataset, with supporting evidence from the paper.

Human-Generated.description: The time series or signal-based data is entirely logged by humans or captured by real-world sensors and instruments, e.g. handwritten logs, ECGs, IoT sensor data, or market tickers.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the human-generated nature of the time series or signal-based data is stated or supported (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the time series or signal-based data is classified as human-generated.

Model-Generated.description: The time series or signal-based data is synthetically produced by AI models, e.g. synthetic forecasts or model-based extrapolations.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the model-generated nature of the time series or signal-based data is stated or supported (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the time series or signal-based data is classified as model-generated.

Unknown Origin.description: The source of the time series or signal-based data is not specified, not reported, or derived from web-crawl data with unclear provenance.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if the dataset includes time series or signal-based data with unknown provenance. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper indicating the information of the dataset time series or signal-based data (e.g., 'Appendix A').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the origin is considered unknown.

N/A.description: The dataset does not contain any time series or signal-based data.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if the dataset contains no time series or signal-based data. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper confirming that the dataset does not include time series or signal-based data (e.g., 'Section 1.1').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the dataset is not applicable for time series or signal-based data analysis.
